Brief description: Hourly and daily count of rental bikes in a large city.

Dataset Name: New York City Taxi Trip Data
Brief description: Trip data for yellow and green taxis in New York City.
Preprocessing: Gives pick up and drop off locations, fares, and other details of trips.
Creator: New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission

Brief description: Trajectories of all taxis in a large city.

Creator: M. Ferreira et al.
